summary: A Swedish immigrant family struggle to establish a new life for themselves in the forest of Minnesota in the mid 19th Century.
cast: Max von Sydow|Liv Ullmann|Eddie Axberg|Pierre Lindstedt|Allan Edwall|Monica Zetterlund|Hans Alfredson|Agneta Prytz|Halvar Björk|Tom C. Fouts|Peter Lindgren|Per Oscarsson|Oscar Ljung|Karin Nordström|Larry Clementson|Georg Anaya|Ed Carpenter|Bengt Ottekil|Elsa Hofgren|Margita Nyström|Hans Elfvin|Solveig Samzelius|Leif Sandberg|Lasse Martinsson|Pelle Martinsson|Sara-Lena Arnoldsdotter|Frans Oddner|Yvonne Oppstedt|Linn Ullmann|Eva-Lena Zetterlund
title: La nueva tierra
